name: Torrent Overshirt
desc: A must-have for transitional weather and every day. The Torrent Overshirt features a lightweight woven shell with a breathable jersey lining that’s perfect for layering on the go. Zippered front pockets, elastic cuffs and a relaxed fit seal the deal. Take it wherever you’re headed by layering it over a crew neck tee and a go-to pant.
fit:
Oversized silhouette - size down for a closer, more snug fit
Model is 6’2” tall with 39” chest & 32” waist – he wears size M.
fabircation:
Lightweight woven lined with jersey fabric 
Zippered front pockets 
Elastic cuffs 
Odor resistant
Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low; low iron. Do not dry clean.

name: Legend Jacket

The Cadence Jacket is a lightweight, wear-anywhere jacket that’s engineered for movement with ease, featuring sleek, weather-tested ripstop fabric, a full front zipper, and a vented back that allows extra airflow for a breathable, relaxed fit. The clutch, 3-panel hood has your back when temps drop.
fit:
Regular fit 
Model is 6’2” tall, with 39” chest & 32” waist — he wears size M.
fabircation:
Street-ready, water-resistant ripstop 
Full zipper
Lightweight jacket – easy to wear and throw on
Two pockets 
3-panel hood
Vented back
Bungee detail 
Machine wash cold on gentle cycle, with like colors. Hang to dry; warm iron if needed. Do not dry clean.

name: Faux Fur Urbanite Bomber
desc: It’s like we read your mind — yes, the Faux Fur Urbanite Bomber is here and we lined it with fur for off-the-mat moves. The Faux Fur Urbanite Bomber is super-cozy, with an oversized silhouette and thick faux fur lining. A 2-in-1 sleeve pocket features a hidden zip pocket for securing your essentials.
fit:
Regular length bomber jacket hits at the hip
Oversized fit
Model is 6’2” tall, with 39” chest & 32” waist — he wears size M.
fabircation:
2-in-1 sleeve pocket
Hidden zip pocket
Machine wash separately on cold, gentle cycle. Tumble dry low, gentle cycle. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.

name: Repeat Running Jacket
desc: Studio. Street. Chill. Repeat. The Repeat Running Jacket, made from high-tech, ripstop fabric, is the perfect lightweight jacket for morning runs or making moves all day. A vented back gives extra airflow for comfort, while a 3-panel hood with Alo-logo bungee closure in the back keeps you covered. Two pockets hold all your essentials — plus, this weightless jacket compresses for convenient travel.
fit:
Regular fit
Model is 6’2” tall, with 39” chest & 32” waist — he wears size M.
fabircation:
Cooling, lightweight ripstop
Vented back
3-Panel hood with bungee closure
Two pockets
Water resistant

name: Ripstop 1/4 Zip On-Set Jacket
desc: Keep it top-notch from the top down with the Ripstop 1/4 Zip On-Set Jacket, made from high-tech, water-resistant ripstop fabric. A bungee drawcord easily locks in heat in cooler weather while the handy front pocket keeps small essentials secure at the gym or on the streets. Lightweight, on-point and perfect for on-the-go when paired with performance bottoms.
fit:
Relaxed fit
Raglan sleeve & stand up collar 
Model is 6’2” tall, with 39” chest & 32” waist — he wears size M.
fabircation:
Street-ready, water-resistant ripstop 
Zips to midsection 
Cuffed sleeves
Bungee drawcord closure
Lined with athletic mesh
Machine wash cold on gentle cycle, with like colors. Hang to dry; warm iron if needed. Do not dry clean.

name: Torrent Overshirt
desc: A must-have for transitional weather and every day. The Torrent Overshirt features a lightweight woven shell with a breathable jersey lining that’s perfect for layering on the go. Zippered front pockets, elastic cuffs and a relaxed fit seal the deal. Take it wherever you’re headed by layering it over a crew neck tee and a go-to pant.
fit:
Oversized silhouette - size down for a closer, more snug fit
Model is 6’2” tall with 39” chest & 32” waist – he wears size M.
fabircation:
Lightweight woven lined with jersey fabric 
Zippered front pockets 
Elastic cuffs 
Odor resistant
Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low; low iron. Do not dry clean.
